settings.heading: MINT (5A)
settings.content:
• The very finest balls from our hand-selected sorting process
  • Excellent/superb condition
  • No scuffs or club marks
  • May contain team or corporate logos and/or standard player pen markings

settings.heading: NEAR MINT (4A)
settings.content:
• Very good condition balls at a reasonable price
  • May have vary slight abrasions or minor discoloration
  • May have small blemishes or cosmetic
  • May have larger player pen markings
  • May contain team or corporate logos

settings.heading: GOOD (3A)
settings.content:
• Playable balls for the golfer that doesn't mind some small abrasions or scuff marks
  • May have varied discoloration/tint
  • May contain team or corporate logos and/or larger player pen markings
  • May include imprints of X-Outs or Practice on them
